venue.address_1: $5 parking fee so meet in the lower Ammo Parking Lot
venue.name: Marshfield Station, Base Rd

item.description:
I will be starting from Marshfield Station on Base Road (cog railway) and going up the Jewell Trail. Then we will take the Gulfside to Jefferson. Then backtrack on Gulfside. At this point we decide to either go back down Jewell Trail or continue onto Monroe and go down Ammonoosuc Trail. Additionally tagging Mt. Washington will not be an option, though Mt. Clay might be.

It is about 11.8 miles and 5300' of elevation for the round trip. More than half of this mileage is above treeline. Crampons wil be needed as likely will snowshoes.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the Disclaimer and things you must know. Read What to wear on a hike and pack water and food
item.how_to_find_us: Parked in lower left parking lot. Cell # 603-479-4074
item.why: 6+ miles of above treeline hiking. Forecast is for sunny to partly cloudy skies, mild wind, and mild temps.
item.name: Mt. Jefferson and Mt. Monroe
